instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00239: What is 820-00239? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00239</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac work but no USB power for HDD external
threads.message:
Hi,
i have this board with a problem with external Hard drive, no power for external hard drive.
I have a tester for usbc port, the power supply charge the battery (20V 1-2A). but nothing for external hard drive.
i don't understand why it work only in one way.
The motherboard contact with liquid (near <CHIP>U7650</CHIP>), i change some component here (<CHIP>U7650</CHIP>, <CAPACITOR>C6914</CAPACITOR>,<CAPACITOR>C6912</CAPACITOR>,<CAPACITOR>C6917</CAPACITOR>) but still same.
do you have an idea to help me please?
thanks

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00239</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac work but no USB power for HDD external
threads.message: Did you test if USB mouse and pendrive work?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00239</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac work but no USB power for HDD external
threads.message:
no the mouse and pendrive not work, and i try a tester USB3 i haven't 5V. 
i try on a good know macbook pro, i can see the 5V on the tester.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00239</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac work but no USB power for HDD external
threads.message:
All four ports the same?
Do you get 20V on USB-C meter without battery?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00239</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac work but no USB power for HDD external
threads.message:
yes all four port work to charge the macbook pro.
yes i have always 20V all usbc without battery but never the 5V for old usb.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00239</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac work but no USB power for HDD external
threads.message: Did you try another USB-C hub?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00239</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac work but no USB power for HDD external
threads.message: my hub work on a good mac and the hub of my customer don't work too.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00239</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac work but no USB power for HDD external
threads.message:
i try a hd external usbc is same, not work.
I think it work on one way. Do you have ever see that?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00239</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac work but no USB power for HDD external
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00239</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac work but no USB power for HDD external
threads.message:
no i haven't 5V at L3500.
i find the problem, i have 3 resistors bad (RB701,RB706,<RESISTOR>R3506</RESISTOR> 100ohm instead of 2,2ohm). i change the three and the usb port work with external hard drive.
thanks for your help.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00239</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac work but no USB power for HDD external
threads.message: Bad <RESISTOR>R3506</RESISTOR> caused missing 5V for USB-C ports...
